review_text: Unique Facebook Ads Techniques Course ever ..

Very detailed instruction on how to map out your Ad Creation AND Awesome Strategies that will give experienced Digital Advertisers a deeper look into what happens under the hood of FB Ads Manager.

With Azriel's FB Ads Course I've been able to give better consult to my current and prospective clients! 11/10

Incredible course for beginner to Facebook ads! Exactly what I was looking for!! I have wasted so much money in the past because I didn't know any of this and now I feel confident to re-enter the Facebook ads scene and get my ROI :)
One of the best course for people who actually willing to increase their knowledge in Facebook Ads!
Great course! Worth every penny!! I highly recommend him.
This course should be way more than what the cost is. Def a must!
extremely helpful :)
Excellent!

The course is good because it talks about many things. The only thing is that I thought it showed us more about setting setting things up in our Ads Manager. Making things from the first step with descriptive videos of how to set up everything. But it gives you great information on what you need to be doing.
great insights and totally state of the art information!
This is an awesome Facebook course.I have seen why I wasn't getting significant results from my Facebook Ads.

This is an extremely awesome course! I've really enjoyed this course and I will be watching it again and again.  I literally took 8 pages of notes to make sure I'm able to reference this course for optimization my ads
Great course, even though I have a few successful campaigns under my belt I still managed to learn something new in this VERY BASIC FB ad course.

I have taken numerous courses in my life and several on Fiverr, and this is perhaps one of the worst courses I have ever encountered in my life. It is not structured properly and the instructor contradicts himself in one part. He also proposes use of a keyword tool that is clearly a bit too costly for most Fiverr users.
It's pretty basic, with no real techniques or ways to set up campaigns and scale them. This course is a very general overview of Digital Marketing with facebook, not how to run facebook ads.

This course has good info that is helpful. It's a high-level overview, not a details-driven course. If you're a beginner it's good info to know from a high level but you'll need another course to get into the nitty-gritty. It helps me realize I don't want to do FB ads. I'll just hire someone to do it.
The best tutorial I've seen in recent times.
Mind blown! Thank you and well worth every penny
Great value!
Awesome!!
It would be good if can include how to do the FB adv live with an example..
If you want to become an expert of the subject from scratch in less than two hours, you have to follow this course. This guy is absolutely brilliant!
I would have liked the practice to be actually live on Zoom/Facebook to set up the campaigns.  This course is a good first step to understand what to do.

As a very successful Business Development Manager in the retail automotive sector I always look for ways to hack processes as a way of cutting my learning curve in half and increasing my return on investment by orders of magnitude in the shortest amount of time possible.  This course fits that criteria.
This course was great for strategy, but light on implementation within the Facebook Ads Manager. No complaints however, I still found value in the information provided.
A good course for the beginner
Great course, excellent techniques to use.
Knowledge is everything! Amazing fb ads techniques!

We are running SMMA agency. We learn a lot from this guy. He shared a lot of his expertise in his course.
Must watch if you want to build your own SMMA or you want to grow your own business and if you want to provide your services as a Freelancer.
Recommended.
very clear and informative. Definitely learning something new

Very informative and comprehensive review.  Easy to follow and understand

Was very helpful to develop the campaign results. Hope to use those strategies soon in my career. Thank you fiverr!
A must watch for anyone starting or wanting to get results from their Facebook ads.
A great course to learn, excellent illustrations and content well elaborated !

Great information and learn a lot about Facebook ads which have been struggling lately and I’m to step up my knowledge today.
I am learning a lot, but I wish that there were more demonstrations. For example, creating the ad start to finish or showing examples of landing pages.
Great course for anyone even a marketer, great key points and to the point
super
I'm smarter than I was when I started. Thank you. The course was succinct, extremely informative and at a reasonable price.
I liked the course!
Great content with very actionable tips and tricks!
I learnt how to optimize my ads to perform better. No more guess work. The course is great but I expected more from the tutor.
Great source of knowledge to get started.
Very informative. each chapter gets me closer to understanding how to target the right audience and spend the least amount of budget. the CBO is an excellent to scale my campaigns

Great overview with good detailing.  The only drawback for me is this:  his examples always assume you already have an audience of some kind, i.e. email subscribers, website visitors, Instagram followers, etc.  That's a HUGE assumption for a Facebook ads course targeting beginners!  I had to read between the lines to figure what I need to do as a brand new entrepreneur.  Anyways, good course.

It's definitely engaging and informative. I feel all those who wanted to target their customers are pointed in the right direction. So far so good, Instructor is super good at explaining everything very clearly. As the course progresses it is becoming more and more interesting.

This course is a fantastic resource if you want to scale your marketing strategy through Facebook ads. I have always been alittle intimidated by the process, worrying if I was throwing my money away because I didn't understand the who, what and how to get the results I wanted, but now I feel like I can do it myself and grow my business in a smart, sustainable way. A big thank you to the instructor for making this course so in-depth!
I think the teacher is very clear and straightfoward. I do recommend the course and I am looking forward for a more advanced content from the same instructor.

At first, I was afraid to do ads on Facebook but now with this course, I have learned a lot and never be afraid of failure thank you for everything you are the best. What I learned and did not think mattered before is the CBO cheat sheet.
Very informative. I will definitely apply this new knowledge to my Facebook ads.
An interesting theoretical course and I manage to learn new things. I was waiting to do practical exercises inside the platform. Sometimes the concepts were confusing.
I learn a lot from the video just as I was about considering  a Facebook AD and I did not know what to click on to increase the conversion rate I needed to improve sales on my website
good course. Helped me alot.

The Instructor does an incredible job of giving step by step instructions. He covers every part of a facebook campaign, with special attention to building the correct audiences. I highly recommend this course, it's worth every penny!
-Jade

Very interesting course, explained briefly and clearly, step by step, the entire process to correctly place ads on Facebook. I would like more videos from this lecturer in this way on the Facebook Ads Techniques for advanced users. From next year I want to start properly with eCommerce in Germany for Germany Markt and am already preparing for it. Thank you for the video content! When are the next courses coming?
So far I have learned a lot about how Facebook ad techniques that help you maximize your reach on Facebook.  Now to try to put it into practice.
Good Course. Learned a lot
great stuff
Great Course!!
Not updated. Doesn't show anything about targetting. Everything I've watched so far is outdated. Good ideas, but most of them wont work anymore...

This is one of my first courses that I have undertook on Fiverr and I was very impressed, The speaker alone is very knowledgable and was able to put all steps into bite size pieces so they were easy to understand if you had never done ads before.

Even as a veteran in the field, it was nice to refresh myself on the little things I have forgotten over the years and spark new challenges and opportunities I could be using in my ads.

Thank you!

Fascinating course.

Many portions of this beautiful course is unfortunately outdated - to be more specific the suggested account structure, available tools like insights and ad account management like audience testing etc. These used to be the way to run and scale an ad account but many things have changed after the IOS14 update - now how we manage ad accounts is a whole a lot different. 

Kind regards from Germany
